step_data.thought: I have obtained the bicycle route directions from Lower Manhattan to Upper Manhattan, which indicates a distance of 9.4 km and a travel time of 42 minutes. Now, to compare this with the car route, I need to change the mode of transport to 'Car (OSRM)' in the dropdown menu and click the 'Go' button again to get the car route directions.
